description: API Data Adapters for transforming backend API data to frontend component interfaces, including functions to fetch courses, lessons, course details, and backend health status.

methods.name: fetchLearnerCourses
methods.description: Fetches all published courses from backend and adapts data to frontend format.

methods.name: fetchCourseLessons
methods.description: Fetches lessons for a specific course and transforms data.

methods.name: fetchCourseWithLessons
methods.description: Fetches a single course with its lessons and details.

methods.name: checkBackendHealth
methods.description: Checks if the backend API is available.
